summary: ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR THAT HOLDS THE HEAD LIGHT INTO SOCKET HAS SHORTED OUT 4 TIMES.  THIS ACTUALLY MELTS AND SMELLS LIKE A ELECTRICAL FIRE.  WE'VE HAD TO REPLACE BOTH HEAD LIGHT CONNECTOR'S 2 TIMES.  THIS IS A 1995 SUBARU LEGACY.  THE DEALER IN ANGLES CAMP,CA HAS TOLD US HE HAS SEEN THIS PROBLEM MANY TIMES FOR THE MODEL AND YEAR OF OUR CAR.   *NLM
